column5: SWN margins are smaller so production has to increase Production increases prices go down margin decreases Production increases more the same effect keeps happening and then cut capex Eventually nothing left to do but shut down They have to produce to make money but the more they produce the less money they make No money for Capex and thats it Only thing that changes the cycle is demand Has to significantly increase or they have to just stop production until demand returns Not worth buying or selling at this point
SWN again the manipulation is obvious This is just getting ridiculous Sell this company as MGMT is unable to give us our money back
Per data reported to FINRA short volume divided by total volume for SWN was 7336 on 060319 volumebotcomsSWN
